sentences.sContent: The selling broker is then required to assign a portion of the commission to the buyer broker.
sentences.sCn: 卖方经纪人则被要求分给买方经纪人一部分佣金。

remMethod.val: as + sign(签名， 做记号) → 记下某人做某事 → 指派

words.tran: [经] 可分配的；可指定的；可让渡的
分配；约会；指定；[经] 转让

trans.tranCn: 指派； 分配； 归于
trans.tranOther: to give someone a particular job or make them responsible for a particular person or thing
